channel.title: Little help please! :)
channel.description: Alright, so basically on my 508 Palidino 76 I would like to make items drop on death in the wilderness but also make a fun pk area, because items are already not dropped on death the fun pk is easy although making players lose items on death not so much, I am using Mithscape 508 as my source, can anybody help?

item.title: Little help please! :)
item.dc:creator: @Liru Liru
item.description:
@Liru wrote:

Alright, so basically on my 508 Palidino 76 I would like to make items drop on death in the wilderness but also make a fun pk area, because items are already not dropped on death the fun pk is easy although making players lose items on death not so much, I am using Mithscape 508 as my source, can anybody help?
